docs.title: Welcome to Shiftpedia!
docs.text:
Shiftpedia is a documentation for my own original story, Shiftbreaker. It is also a place to find resources to help make your own stories! I hope you enjoy your time here.

  • Main Characters

    You can find all of the important characters you should know here!

    Characters

  • All the Lore

    If you're interested in where the characters came from and what they're doing!

    Lore

  • The Blog

    Updates about the site, and about the characters story! Also the occasional rant

    Index

  • Resources, Resources!

    Want to make new characters? Want to try new things with your OC? Look no further!

    Character Creation

docs.title: Aislin Diamant
docs.text:
"Quite amusing, is it not? To play both the loved and hated... I'm sure you found it quite fun."

Aislin Diamant is a gentleman thief and a shapeshifter who uses their abilities to steal jewels and artifacts. They also occasionally live with Ember as a cat named Trick. Because of their species, they would be outshun if they were found out. So they’ve learned to keep people at a distance without losing their trust as best as they possibly can.

  • Name Aislin Diamant

    Race Shapeshifter

    Age 23

    Gender Enby

    Pronouns Any

    Height 5'8

    Born 09/19/2031

docs.title: Personality
docs.text:
They are a outgoing and charming person, usually using their charm to get their way into and out of situations. They tend to analyze wherever they are to make sure they can escape if needed, even if they trust the person who brought them there. Although when its time for actions, they can sometimes be hasty and scatterbrained.

They are very imaginative and talkative as well, and like to tease whoever they're with for fun. They tend to start talking more if they're uncomfortable or aren't interested in the current conversation. But they can also get very quiet at times if they’re in their head or if they're intimidated.

docs.title: Appearence
docs.text: They have a skinny frame with broad shoulders and a more masculine face shape. They have wavy, long ginger hair and darker purple eyes. They have two moles under each eye that are replicated in their thief uniform as well. Their body has small scars mostly around the stomach and upper leg area. Can only snapeshift into domesticated animals.

docs.title: Early Life
docs.text:
Aislin was born from the infamous shapeshifter experiment that happened from 2025 to 2030. Their mother was selected and injected with a gene commonly found in domesticated animals. A year later most of the world had flooded, and their mother fled with other mothers and children of the experiment to a small island not too far from the city.

The parents tried their best to provide food for everyone, but after a few years, they had to start going to the city for resources. This left the mothers absent from the older kids, as they tried to take care of the youngest.

One of the older kids, Estrella, tended to hang around Aislin a lot. They would play pretend and make plans to save their island together. When they were teenagers, Estrella was taken away from the island without a word. This left Aislin sad and confused, but also determined to find out what happened to her from her mouth.

When Aislin got older, they realized how much the mothers were struggling to take care of some of the younger kids. Wanting to do something to help and take stress off of the mothers and kids, they started shapeshifting and stealing things from the city with a gentleman thief persona, inspired by much of the pretend they did with Estrella. They enjoyed playing and toying with the police, and the recognition and praise they got on the island.

docs.title: Present Day
docs.text:
After a few months of building their thief identity, a new cop was assigned to the area they usually steal from. Aislin felt they were different than usual cops— engaging with their banter and seeing threw a lot of their plays. They started to seek out interactions with this specific cop, to see how they would respond.

After an especially hard chase, it was getting too dark to go back to their island. They decided to shift into a cat to take a nap in a secure area until they could get back. By the time they woke up, someone had found them and brought them in their house. Concinidently, it ended up being the new cop, Ember.

Ember continued to allow Aislin (Who she has nicknamed 'Trick') to sleep and occasionally eat at her house. Despite her hospitality, Aislin tries not to overstay their welcome as they still feel a little guilty about the situation.

docs.title: Likes and Dislikes
docs.text:
• They like...

    • Jewels and gems, or anything shiny
    • Transforming into a cat
    • Almost all puddings
    • Growing their own vegetables
  • They dislike...

    • Energy drinks and cucumbers
    • Being forced to shapeshift
    • Having to resort to violence
    • Tight spaces

docs.title: Ember Kruetz
docs.text:
acquaintances/rivals/love interest |

Aislin admires Ember's hospitality and kindness. Their relationship is extremely complicated, with Ember being kind and affectionate towards them when they’re transformed into a cat and as their rival when they are untransformed. Despite that, they still do care for Ember and find their quarrels fun and exciting— they also are a little interested in her romantically.

"Ah, my favorite detective! I wonder how long it’ll be until she realizes?"

docs.title: Estrella Snow
docs.text:
family |

Aislin sees Estrella as an older sister and looks up to her deeply. They are aware of her now famous status and sometimes goes to visit her before shows. Although, Estrella doesn’t seem to remember Aislin but participates in their conversations anyway. Aislin doubts they actually have forgotten, but doesn't question it and appreciates the time they spend together regardless.

"I miss her, sometimes. She’s still here, but so distant..."

docs.title: Juliette Diamant
docs.text:
biological family |

Aislin's mother. Left the island about 3 years after her birth. Although Aislin doesn't remember her well, people around her say she was a wonderful and calm lady. She doesn't blame her mom for what she did.

docs.title: Jaime
docs.text:
friend/family |

Somewhat of a younger sibling to them. He's a big troublemaker and kind of a hassle sometimes, but he's a good kid.

docs.title: Robin
docs.text:
friends |

One of the mothers. She's an amazing chef, and Aislin asks her often to cook meals for the rest of the kids. She can be a little quiet sometimes, but she always gets the job done.

docs.title: Liana
docs.text:
family |

Her main caretaker and mother figure. She is supportive of most of Aislin's endeavors as long as she isn't hurting herself. She is also a seamstress and taught Aislin how to sew at a young age.

docs.title: Trivia
docs.text:
• Loves collecting things and being crafty with them. They find buttons, clothing scraps, or even pencils and will turn it into something else. Also loves drawing still life even if their skills aren't that great. Also is very fond of sewing.
  • Somehow they've mastered the art of over and underthinking. They're very skeptical of anyone they meet and will keep them at a arms length just in case they're dangerous— and then they'll charge into a dangerous situation because they're sure it'll 'be fine'.
  • Really friendly with children. They grew up around a bunch of little kids so they're very fond of them. They also know sign language because of this!

docs.title: Quirk Box
docs.text:
Small facts that aren't long enough for a specific section.

    • Has colorblindness (deuteranopia, red green weakness)
    • Suffers with pretty bad chronic insomnia and doesn't have access to any sleeping pills
    • They use their hands a lot while talking
    • Has a very high pain tolerance
    • They don't get flustered often, but if they do they blush a lot. Full tomato
    • Chews on many a pen and pencil
    • Doesn't ever really stop moving. They're always working towards something even at the cost of their own physical and mental health

    • Playlist

      Main theme:

      • 'The Villain I Appear to be' by Connor Spiotto

      Playlist Link:

      • Youtube Music

docs.title: Ember Kreutz
docs.text:
Warning

This page is under construction!

"Even to stoop that low… I would never!"

Ember Kruetz is a police officer and makeshift detective for the precinct. Usually in charge of cases with [Aislin], and is the main person chasing her down. Major workaholic. She can be very focused and serious person, especially when doing her job. Although, she tries to be kind whenever she can and is very empathetic. She’s not aware that [Aislin] is her pet cat— who she calls ‘Trick’.

  • Name Ember Kruetz

    Race Human

    Age 24

    Gender Cis Female

    Pronouns She/Her

    Height 5'2

    Born 01/30/2030

    • Any and all types of animals

  • They dislike...

    • Anything with a overly mushy texture

docs.title: Trivia
docs.text:
• Despite loving animals, she was never allowed a pet when she was younger. She tried bribing her parents a billion times for one.
  • Her earring is a family heirloom that was given to her by her mom for her 16th birthday.
  • Her house is an absolute mess and she'll probably never clean it. She says its because shes just "too busy".
  • She has a different design at first which I hated so much I immediately redesigned her......

docs.title: Aislin
docs.text: Stardew ValleyRPG

docs.title: Aislin
docs.text:
• Name Aislin

    Farm Name Bumblebee Farm

    Age 21

    Birthday Fall 19

    Interests Polishing Geodes, Sketching, Sewing

    Best Gifts Salmon Dinner, Seafoam Pudding, Aquamarine

docs.title: Personality
docs.text: High energy and outgoing. They are naturally charismatic, but a bit too socially awkward to use it. When they're working, they can be extremely focused and calculating. Loves to talk on and on to loved ones.

docs.title: Biography
docs.text: Aislin and Estrella grew up together in Zuzu City. Their parents were usually away, so both of them grew with many life skills under their belts. After much thought, they decided to move out of the city and move into the Valley. While they were there, they met Ember, a newly moved in farmer who inherented her grandfathers farm. As they had nowhere to go, Ember decided to let them live there as long as they paid rent and helped with the farm. Aislin was extremely happy with this predicament. They had always been the more messy sibling, so doing more messy work worked out perfectly for them.

docs.title: Abigail
docs.text: They usually go into the mines together. They have a lot of fun adventuring with her. friend |

docs.title: Robin
docs.text: Since they're the one usually going for carpentry orders, they chat quite a lot with her and she gives great advice. friend |

docs.title: Emily
docs.text: Their sewing buddy. They also get dragged into whatever events Emily is hosting that week, but they enjoy it. friend |

docs.title: Estrella
docs.text: Their sister and best friend. Loves to annoy her any chance they can get. family |

docs.title: Ember
docs.text: Second best friend and roommate. They chat a lot about pretty much everything. They're still a little shy sometimes, but for a different reason. roommate/crush |

docs.title: Trivia
docs.text:
• Have tried to eat every crystal they've found at least once as a rite of passage.
  • They really like classical music and has a boombox in their room and a billion classical cds.
  • Loves all kinds of fish. Also begged Ember to adopt a kitten, who they named 'Trick'.

docs.title: Character ideas
docs.text: Some of my favorite things to do with my ocs! Of course a great thing you can do is write that story. I know, its hard, but it'll be worth it :) In the meantime though, try one of these!

docs.title: No Drawing/Writing
docs.text:
• Make a shrine (Example)
  • Make a personality quiz
  • Make an UTAU
  • Make merch (manufacturers/homemade)
  • Make a playlist for them
  • Make an OC Binder
  • Make memes with them
  • Make a fake/real social media based on them

docs.title: Writing
docs.text:
• Make an AU (Actor/Coffee Shop/Roleswap/etc.)
  • Make a wikipedia or website
  • Fill out a google doc template
  • Write small interactions
  • Pick out tropes from TV Tropes for them (Flaws/Characterization)
  • Interview them (My personal favorite template)
  • Make a 'box' for them filled with random trivia

docs.title: Drawing
docs.text:
• Make a Shimeji
  • Make a MMD/Vroid Model
  • Make a spinoff/slice of life comic series
  • Make them a wallpaper/custom theme
  • Make kandi based on their color scheme
  • Make a felt plush of them
  • Redraw them in a different piece of media (Anime/Cartoon/etc.)
  • Dedicate a sketchbook to them
  • Make a custom cursor

docs.title: Welcome to Shiftpedia!
docs.text: Welcome to my very cool original character based documentation. This post is to answer a few questions and just generally introduce this wiki-documentation.

docs.title: What is Shiftpedia?
docs.text: Shiftpedia is a documentation for my own original story, Shiftbreaker. The site itself is built using MkDocs, with the Material theme and is hosted on GitHub Pages. It holds all characters, artwork, literatures, and the lore itself. It also has any resources I find about character creation and any other fun things I'd like to share!

docs.title: Why MkDocs?
docs.text: I have my characters stored in a billion different sites and even jumbled in a google drive. And I do really like all of those options, but I wanted something simple that I had most control over that people could still view. So, website! I did think about making all the pages myself with just HTML and CSS, but I decided it would be better if I used some type of framework or generator. And after experimenting with a few, Material ended up being the easiest!

docs.title: How do I make something like this?
docs.text:
I'm planning on eventually explaining how I did this— but if you want to try yourself, this youtube tutorial and the Material docs are a great way to get started! Feel free to ask anything in the comments as well if you have any questions on how I did a specific thing.

If you have anymore questions, feel free to ask either in the comments or my inbox on Tumblr! I hope you enjoy your time here, dear reader!
